text.section: Subject to the provisions of this section, the Board may waive the education requirements of § 4-302 of this subtitle for an applicant for a limited license to practice dentistry who does not hold a degree of Doctor of Dental Surgery, Doctor of Dental Medicine, or the equivalent from a college or university that is authorized by any state or any province of Canada to grant the degree and is recognized by the Board under § 4-302(d)(2) of this subtitle.

A limited license to practice dentistry issued to an applicant for a waiver under this section shall expire and be surrendered immediately to the Board if:
The licensee's contract with the public health dental clinic, federally qualified health center, or Maryland qualified health center expires; or
The licensee fails, for any reason, to fully satisfy the licensee's obligations under subsection (b)(1)(iv) and (v) of this section.
